titleStmt.title: George Starkey's pill vindicated from the unlearned alchymist and all other pretenders with a brief account of other excellent, specifick remedies of extraordinary virtue for the honour and vindication of pyrotechny.
titleStmt.author: Starkey, George, 1627-1665.

notesStmt.note: A defense of his pill which he claims has been stolen by Richard Mathews.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
